name: A-Maze-Beans Game
description:
The concepts in this game is to find a can of beans, Each level in the game have their own challenge and character.

  • In level 1 the level is Start in Easy to Impossible but be careful when stepping the black cube because there's a hidden box collider in it.
  • In level 2 you must avoid falling in the spike board. to unlock the yellow wall collect the maracas to open it,
  • In Level 3 is walk through the piano and beware when stepping the gray wall with subwoofer, avoid touching the red block cause when you hit it must repeat again the level, find the right piano keys correctly, wrong step you fall.
  • In level 4 roll the bike cube ball in a gray wall, try not to drowning.
  • In level 5 collect the pie as fast as you can.
  • When you in the final level keep pressing "W" keys for up, to finishing the level. (In blue and black)

    Note: This is a hard game platformer, don't get mad or rage when falling or hit negative thing.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys for Movement and SpaceBar for Jumping

https://www.peakpx.com/en/hd-wallpaper-desktop-pnxtw

https://free3d.com/3d-model/dessert-pie-v3--264551.html

Its a fan game from england cartoon. (The Build Game is 17/03/2022)

Credits: TGU Skybox Pack by Babycake Studio, Freesound and Fantom for the music.
